titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to allow the deduction for State and local income and property taxes under the alternative minimum tax.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 5/15/2007--Introduced. Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow the tax deduction for state and local income and property taxes as an adjustment in computing alternative minium taxable income.
